chunks.title: Transfer Command Not Working
chunks.body: Symptom: Clicked 'Send to X.com' button but NYLA didn't respond or transfer didn't execute.
chunks.summary_en: Transfer sent via 'Send to X.com' button but no NYLA response - diagnostic steps and fixes.
chunks.summary_zh: 通过'发送到X.com'按钮发送但NYLA无响应 - 诊断步骤和修复方法。

symptoms: Clicked 'Send to X.com' button in NYLAGo
Transaction not showing up in wallet

causes.check: Verify all fields were filled correctly: username (no @), amount, token type, and blockchain network
Ensure recipient wallet exists on the same network as sender
Check wallet balance covers amount + network fees

fixes.details_en: Check all fields in Send tab: username (without @), amount (numbers only), token type matches blockchain
fixes.details_zh: 检查发送选项卡中的所有字段：用户名（不带@），金额（仅数字），代币类型匹配区块链

fixes.details_en: Ensure @username exists on X.com and recipient has wallet on same network
fixes.details_zh: 确保@用户名在X.com上存在，且收件人在同一网络上有钱包

fixes.details_en: Confirm you have sufficient tokens + network fees (Solana: ~$0.0001, Ethereum: $5-50+, Algorand: ~$0.001)
fixes.details_zh: 确认您有足够的代币+网络费用（Solana：约0.0001美元，Ethereum：5-50+美元，Algorand：约0.001美元）

fixes.details_en: If network is congested, wait 10-15 minutes and try clicking 'Send to X.com' again
fixes.details_zh: 如果网络拥堵，等待10-15分钟后再次尝试点击'发送到X.com'

fixes.details_en: If issue persists, contact NYLA team (@shax_btc, @btcberries) with screenshot of your X.com post
fixes.details_zh: 如果问题仍然存在，请联系NYLA团队（@shax_btc，@btcberries）并提供您X.com帖子的截图

chunks.title: QR Code Won't Scan
chunks.body: Symptom: Generated QR code but mobile devices can't scan or recognize it.
chunks.summary_en: QR code scanning problems - diagnostic steps and mobile compatibility fixes.
chunks.summary_zh: 二维码扫描问题 - 诊断步骤和移动兼容性修复。

symptoms: QR code appears blank or corrupted
Mobile scanner doesn't recognize QR code

causes.check: QR code appears pixelated or blurry on screen
QR code is hard to see clearly
Different QR scanner apps give different results
QR generation failed due to poor connectivity

fixes.details_en: Go to Receive tab, re-enter amount and network, click 'Generate QR Code' again
fixes.details_zh: 转到接收选项卡，重新输入金额和网络，再次点击'生成二维码'

fixes.details_en: Set screen brightness to maximum for better QR code visibility
fixes.details_zh: 将屏幕亮度设置到最大，以便更好地显示二维码

fixes.details_en: Use built-in camera app or download dedicated QR scanner (Google Lens, QR Code Reader)
fixes.details_zh: 使用内置相机应用或下载专用二维码扫描器（Google Lens，二维码阅读器）

fixes.details_en: Right-click QR code → Save image, then share via messaging apps instead of direct scanning
fixes.details_zh: 右键点击二维码→保存图片，然后通过消息应用分享，而不是直接扫描

fixes.details_en: Share your X.com username and have sender use NYLAGo's Send tab to transfer to you
fixes.details_zh: 分享您的X.com用户名，让发送者使用NYLAGo的发送选项卡转账给您

chunks.title: Extension Not Loading
chunks.body: Symptom: NYLAGo browser extension won't load or shows blank page.
chunks.summary_en: Browser extension loading problems - troubleshooting steps and fixes.
chunks.summary_zh: 浏览器扩展加载问题 - 故障排除步骤和修复方法。

symptoms: Extension icon appears but clicking shows blank page
Extension popup doesn't appear when clicked

causes.check: Extension worked before but stopped suddenly
Browser shows permission warnings for extension
Multiple crypto or security extensions installed

fixes.details_en: Go to browser Extensions → NYLAGo → Click reload/refresh icon
fixes.details_zh: 转到浏览器扩展→NYLAGo→点击重新加载/刷新图标

fixes.details_en: Clear browser cache and cookies, then restart browser and try extension again
fixes.details_zh: 清除浏览器缓存和cookie，然后重启浏览器并再次尝试扩展

fixes.details_en: Go to Extensions → NYLAGo → Ensure all required permissions are granted
fixes.details_zh: 转到扩展→NYLAGo→确保所有必需的权限都已授予

fixes.details_en: Temporarily disable other crypto/wallet extensions to test if NYLAGo works alone
fixes.details_zh: 暂时禁用其他加密货币/钱包扩展，测试NYLAGo是否单独工作

fixes.details_en: Remove NYLAGo extension completely, restart browser, then reinstall from Chrome Store
fixes.details_zh: 完全移除NYLAGo扩展，重启浏览器，然后从Chrome应用商店重新安装
